resources.string: Your device name is visible to apps on your phone. It may also be seen by other people when you connect to Bluetooth devices or set up a WLAN hotspot.
Back up app data, WLAN passwords and other settings to Google servers
Stop backing up your WLAN passwords, bookmarks, other settings and app data, plus erase all copies on Google servers?
"Turn off WLAN when not using it or when it isn't available"

"Ultra STAMINA mode will extend battery time significantly. Note that, as internet connection through WLAN and Mobile data will be disabled, functions such as data synchronisation and WLAN calling will be unavailable. Your Home screen will be switched to Ultra STAMINA mode Home.
Available apps in Ultra STAMINA mode"

"Ultra STAMINA mode will extend battery time significantly. Note that as the Internet connection via WLAN and mobile data will be disabled, functions such as data synchronisation and %s will be unavailable. Your Home screen will be switched to Ultra STAMINA mode Home.
Available apps in Ultra STAMINA mode"
Allow this app to turn WLAN on or off, scan and connect to WLAN networks, add or remove networks, or start a local-only hotspot
Background data is only available via WLAN. This may affect some apps or services when WLAN is not available.
China Telecom WLAN networks will be prioritised over other WLAN networks when connecting
Unless you use WLAN, you will no longer be able to use the internet, Email or other apps that require a data connection. Turn off the mobile data connection?
Could not connect to China Telecom WLAN networks as data traffic is disabled. Enable data traffic now?
To select metered networks, turn WLAN on.
If you restrict background mobile data, some apps and services won’t work unless you’re connected to WLAN.

"If you restrict background mobile data, some apps and services won’t work unless you’re connected to WLAN.
This setting affects all users on this phone."

"STAMINA mode includes:
• Extended standby Saves power when the screen is off by temporarily disabling WLAN and mobile data. Most applications will be inactive. When the screen is ON, your phone will function normally. If you want to keep some apps active while Extended standby is ON, add the apps to the APPS ACTIVE IN STANDBY list.
• Extended usage Saves power when your device is in use by restricting hardware performance. "

What is STAMINA mode?" STAMINA mode is Sony’s power save function. It extends the battery lifetime when the display is off.
"Basic usage" To turn on STAMINA mode, tap the button on the screen. When the screen is off, in order to save battery life, WLAN and mobile data will be temporarily disabled and most applications will be inactive. When the screen is on, your phone will function normally.
"Advanced usage" If you want to keep some apps active while STAMINA is on, please add the apps into the APPS ACTIVE IN STANDBY list. Applications may not work correctly if they are not added to the list.
"Note" If an application doesn’t work correctly, please register the app in APPS ACTIVE IN STANDBY or turn off STAMINA mode."
Used as your location when you make an emergency call over WLAN

"Automatically back up device data (such as WLAN passwords and call history) and app data (such as settings and files stored by apps) remotely.
When you turn on automatic backup, device and app data is periodically saved remotely. App data can be any data that an app has saved (based on developer settings), including potentially sensitive data such as contacts, messages and photos."
Stop backing up device data (such as WLAN passwords and call history) and app data (such as settings and files stored by apps), plus erase all copies on remote servers?

"STAMINA mode includes:
• Extended standby Saves power when the screen is off by temporarily disabling WLAN. Most applications will be inactive. When the screen is on, your device will function normally. If you want to keep some apps active while Extended standby is enabled, add the apps to the list Apps active in standby.
• Extended usage Saves power when your device is in use by restricting hardware performance."
Allow apps and services to scan for WLAN networks at any time, even when WLAN is off. This can be used, for example, to improve location-based features and services.
You can switch to the mobile network whenever WLAN has a bad connection. Data usage charges may apply.
WLAN is not connected to the Internet
Always keep mobile data active, even when WLAN is active (for fast network switching).
To share your current WLAN network, select the option \"Share WLAN info\" in the setting.
Auto connect to AT&T WLAN hotspot
Unless you use WLAN, you will no longer be able to use the internet, Email or other apps that require a data connection. Turn off the mobile data connection?
Manage WLAN, Bluetooth, airplane mode, mobile networks, & VPNs
"IMS Registration: %1$s Voice over LTE: %2$s Voice over WLAN: %3$s Video Calling: %4$s UT Interface: %5$s"

"This will reset all network settings, including:
"
WLAN" "
Mobile data" "
Bluetooth
Allow modification of WLAN and Mobile settings
Both WLAN and Bluetooth scanning are off
Bluetooth scanning is on, WLAN scanning is off
WLAN scanning is on, Bluetooth scanning is off
Both WLAN and Bluetooth scanning are on
WLAN is turned on. Select your network in the list.
Disables mobile data and WLAN when the screen is off
Please insert SIM card to share your phone’s data connection with other devices using Mobile WLAN Hotspot or USB tethering for internet access.

"You can share this device with other people by creating additional users. Each user has their own space, which they can customise with apps, wallpaper and so on. Users can also adjust device settings such as WLAN that affect everyone.
When you add a new user, that person needs to set up their space.
Any user can update apps for all other users. Accessibility settings and services may not transfer to the new user."

"Ultra STAMINA mode will extend battery lifetime significantly. It can be used when you can't charge your device for a long time.
Only a few basic functions, such as Phone and Messaging will be available. Tap \"More info\" for more details.
Note that internet connection through WLAN and Mobile data will be disabled."

"Emergency calls are not possible via WLAN Calling. The device switches automatically to a mobile network (2G/3G) to make an emergency call. Emergency calls are only possible in areas with cellular coverage."

"To turn on WLAN calling, you have to turn on Location and select High accuracy or Battery saving mode.
Please make sure to keep Location turned on while WLAN calling."

"Emergency calls are not possible via WLAN Calling. The device switches automatically to a mobile network (2G/3G) to make an emergency call. Emergency calls are only possible in areas with cellular coverage."
Your location-related information can be sent to Google and your operator in order to establish WLAN calls, whether Location setting is enabled or not.
WLAN advanced settings are not available for this user
Choose at least one band for WLAN hotspot:
Automatically switch to a preferred network when both the WLAN network and mobile network are available
Click here to register for WLAN Calling or to update your existing Emergency Address
If mobile network is unavailable, use WLAN
Call over WLAN. If WLAN is lost, call will end.
If WLAN is unavailable, use mobile network
WLAN calling is not supported for %1$s

"Use WLAN calling to increase call quality in places where mobile network coverage is poor.
Cost For information about WLAN calling charges, please contact your service provider.
Notes on WLAN calling To stay on WLAN calling, make sure to stay in the WLAN range."
To use WLAN Calling, set Preferred SIM for Mobile data to SIM 1
Turn on WLAN calling to extend coverage
Use WLAN for calls to improve quality
Use mobile data when WLAN has no Internet access. Data usage charges may apply.
"Centre the QR code below to add the device to '%1$s'"
"Scan this QR code to connect to '%1$s'"
"Centre the QR code below to connect to '%1$s'"
Join WLAN by scanning a QR code
"Scan this QR code to connect to '%1$s' and share the password"
"You don't have permission to change the WLAN network."
To see available networks, turn WLAN on.
WLAN hotspot will turn off if no devices are connected
Use hotspot to create a WLAN network for your other devices. Hotspot provides Internet using your mobile data connection. Additional mobile data charges may apply.
Auto-connect to available Passpoint networks when WLAN is on
Don’t use a WLAN network unless it has a good Internet connection

"To improve location accuracy and for other purposes, an unknown app wants to turn on network scanning, even when WLAN is off.
Allow this for all apps that want to scan?"

"To improve location accuracy and for other purposes, %1$s wants to turn on network scanning, even when WLAN is off.
Allow this for all apps that want to scan?"

To improve location accuracy, apps and services can still scan for WLAN networks at any time, even when WLAN is off. This can be used, for example, to improve location-based features and services. You can change this in LINK_BEGINscanning settingsLINK_END.
To improve location accuracy, turn on WLAN scanning in LINK_BEGINscanning settingsLINK_END.
WLAN scanning allows apps and services to scan for WLAN networks at any time, even when WLAN is off. This can be used, for example, to improve location‑based features and services.
To turn on WLAN automatically, you first need to turn on WLAN scanning.
Minimise battery usage when WLAN is on
Switch to mobile data if WLAN loses Internet access.
Set up and manage portable WLAN hotspot
Any ongoing WLAN operations such as media transfer, phone software update, backup and restore will be interrupted.
Increase WLAN logging level, show per SSID RSSI in WLAN Picker
WLAN will turn back on near high‑quality saved networks, like your home network
Unavailable because WLAN scanning is turned off

"STAMINA mode saves battery power by adjusting device settings. You can choose applications to run with reduced functionality during sleep mode. (This helps you save battery power because most apps keep draining the battery even during sleep mode.)
Functions disabled for selected apps: - WLAN - Mobile data - Timer
The notification light for all apps flashes in the same colour at the same frequency during sleep mode.
STAMINA mode is deactivated while you are controlling the device."
